name: Damnaze
description: You were taken into this damn maze, but you are not the first, and you are not the last.Here you do not have friends.You have only hope for salvation. To escape from this place you can use absolutely everything that you have found.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core  i3-7100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 940MX 2GB Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB Storage: 10 GB available space
